structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 158, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 177, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 452, sec. 4, effective July 1, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4042-2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Payment and collection of marginal accounts tax -- Penalty.
